thread.section_title: Frames Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frames Direct | www.framesdirect.com | 11 of 657
thread.title: Casey W
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Casey W

author: Casey W
title: Casey W
text:
This was first time I've ordered eyeglasses online. There was a little delay presumedly due to holidays. When I questioned change of status to backordered, I got a quick reply and was told they were actually waiting on case. They asked if I minded them coming in generic case and correct case would come when in. The glassware then came within 2 or 3 days.
I wear progressive glasses and was concerned reading area would be correct for easy use. All was great. I popped into an eye care store where they were nice enough to adjust stems so glasses wouldn't slip down.
